message.content:
cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.DL, cs.CY, cs.SD

This paper deals with the construction of network maps of technology fields using patent databases and classification information. This topic falls under the domain of information retrieval (IR) and information science (SI), which are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves analyzing and comparing different distance measures, which could fall under the categories of deep learning (DL) or cybernetics (CY). Finally, the paper deals with network analysis and structural properties, which could fall under the sub-category of systems and control (SD).
